Posts.Content: Mar 3, 2017 12:03PM badboobiesurvivor wrote: i am now 3 weeks post savi catheter!! was a little rough and uncomfortable but i knew it was the better choice. whole breast radiation really scared me. still sore and get pains here and there but a tleast my skin is not damaged!!! the removal was really nothing. it didn't hurt anymore than the cleaning they did when they had to move the wires around. i didn't even know she took it out at first. i actually thought she just moved it a little to prepare to take it out. i braced myself for it and she was like "its out" glad the whole ordeal is over now its just follow up visits. i would make the same choice again if I had to do it all over.
Posts.Title: Post brachytherapy radiation and surgery effects Clangtl Irishgirl711

Posts.Content: Mar 3, 2017 12:07PM badboobiesurvivor wrote: i had the savi catheter and found a way to shower. i used a small garbage bad and taped it all around the area with medical tape. then i took another small kitchen bag and made a holes in it for my head and arms and put it over (like a little rain coat) was able to wash my hair and most of me. when i got out i just used a wash cloth for the area covered by the bag
Posts.Title: Post brachytherapy radiation and surgery effects Clangtl Irishgirl711
